Reviews.Title: Great Mic
Reviews.Author: Shenn
Reviews.Content: Easy setup, plugs right in and now I can hear everything on the main floor of my house with one of these.  The white ball looks like its part of the alarm system.  I like it!

Reviews.Title: LARGE
Reviews.Author: James DeMichael
Reviews.Content: Purchased for DIY security setup. This is a large mic and I'd recommend smaller pickup/mic if used alongside camera. I mounted this atop/side of the main box. I would not feel comfortable using for exterior application. Be sure to get male/male RCA connection if you use for my application. As I put in other reviews PLAN, PLAN & PLAN your build. Know the specs of the equipment and accessories needed before you start. It's tough to start and have to wait for needed pieces.

Reviews.Title: Amazing sound
Reviews.Author: Aaron Gustafson
Reviews.Content: I didn't expect these to work Tremendously, but after hooking it up I was absolutely amazed by it's audio quality. There was a little static from the wind/the casing but still absolutely amazing quality for such a cheap price

Reviews.Title: Exceptional product for very little money
Reviews.Author: TERESA
Reviews.Content: We purchased this microphone with my CCTV surveillance. We are very pleased with the surprisingly quality and durability, especially for the price! If you are looking for a microphone that is durable and has great quality for your security camera, this is the one to buy!

Reviews.Title: kind of large
Reviews.Author: mr engineer
Reviews.Content: was expecting a smaller case , it was about 2" in diameter.  I don't think these units really lend themselves to being concealed.  did work ok and had good sensetivity
